attributes.action: over 60 have no photo i.d which is neccessary for everything these days
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to make photo i.d for people who have none.  many who have never left the country.no passport .no driving licence.  this i.d must be for use in all places the same as passports. banks councils it must easy to get. most who have no i.d are over 50
